title: Only 60 of the 1,566 churches in Houston are open to help victims of Hurricane Harvey?
subtitle: Mimi claims that only 4% of the churches in Houston opened their doors to the victims of Hurricane Harvey apparently originated on a ironic Facebook page and were not based on any legitimate statistics.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Only 60 of the 1,566 churches in Houston opened to assist the victims of Hurricane Harvey.
